name: Obastique and the Wintershoes
description:
It's hard to find fashionable winter shoes! Where are they?? Kidnapped by the evil beige Boss shoe of course! Help the fabulous shoes to freedom!

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys - movement
  • Space bar - jump
  • P-key - Pause

Credits
Programming, Graphics, Sound & Music, Animation - Mawleen

Special thanks to:

  • Lo - For programming help when I was stuck, and for general support and encouragement
  • Oba - For having trouble buying wintershoes and inspiring me to do this game
